channel.title: A way to organize my files better?
channel.description:
Right now, I have my files and such like this:
[img]http://img187.imageshack.us/img187/9590/orgranizedbb2.png[/img]
Is there a program that has something that I can easily access my files and is there on startup? Or would I be better leaving it how it is?

item.title: A way to organize my files better?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

ninja nub, you have really gotten cocksure since this whole ordeal betweent Leget and Greeny sprung up. You’re still a noob. Don’t speak to me like that. I was helping you. You asked for help, so I gave you it. Obviously you need it.

Read full topic

item.title: A way to organize my files better?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“ninja nub, post:4, topic:205582”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=271243.msg2224250#msg2224250 date=1210740041]
Just make a batch file that works on startup to open whatever you want.
[/quote]

I don’t use batch or know it.

Spell Miscellaneous right for starters.

Oh fuck off. All we need is is another grammar nazi.[/quote]
Extra ‘is’. gg

Read full topic
